content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
I have difficulty pushing through my workload as no one wants to lend a help.
What sort of things are you having difficulty dealing with, especially with so many people calling in to lend a helping hand?
I am a layman to the issues I am going to deal with.
I see. So there are a lot of tasks you' re having difficulty dealing with, and there is no one to lend a helping hand? Is there something specific you' d like to discuss?
